title: Vitrara Atelier — Where Fire Becomes Form.
description: A luxury glass-blowing studio landing page for the fictional brand Vitrara Atelier. Deep furnace-dark palette with ember amber accents, Cormorant Garamond and DM Sans typography. Animated flame preloader, 5-act process timeline with temperature labels, 3×2 collection grid with vertical offsets, and a bespoke commission enquiry form.
